DOC.brief_title: A Study Of 4-1BB Agonist PF-05082566 Plus PD-1 Inhibitor MK-3475 In Patients With Solid Tumors ( B1641003/KEYNOTE-0036 )
DOC.criteria: Histological cytological diagnosis advanced/metastatic solid tumor malignancy progress standard therapy standard therapy available . Measurable disease per RECIST v1.1 .
